row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_WINDOWS_REGISTRY.PRV.JOBS.CREATE_REMOVED_REPORT@WINDOWS
row.description: A registry path was removed or not found report.

row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS $agentpath=get-location
$snapshotFolder=join-path $agentpath "snapshot\&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID#" $reportFile="$snapshotFolder\compare_&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.xml" $overviewReportFile=join-path $agentpath "snapshot\&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID#\OverviewSnap.xml" $overviewReportDoc=[XML](Get-Content $overviewReportFile) $path=$overviewReportDoc.registrySnapshot.regPath
$guid="&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID#" $currentDateTime=get-date -format "d/MM/%y HH:%m:%s" $xmlDoc='<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>' $xpath='/registrySnapshot[@status="notfound"]' $res=select-xml $xpath $overviewReportDoc if ( $res ) { $xmlDoc=$xmlDoc+'<registrySnapshot date="' + $currentDateTime + '" guid="'+$guid+'" regPath="'+$path+'" type="reg" status="notfound">' } else { $xmlDoc=$xmlDoc+'<registrySnapshot date="' + $currentDateTime + '" guid="'+$guid+'" regPath="'+$path+'" type="reg" status="removed">' $xpath="/registrySnapshot/key" $a=select-xml $overviewReportDoc -xpath $xpath foreach ($i in $a) { $attr=$i.Node.path $xquery='/registrySnapshot/key[@path="'+$attr+'"]' $xquery=$xquery+'/property' $props=select-xml $xquery $overviewReportDoc foreach($j in $props){ $propName=$j.Node.name $propValue=$j.Node.value $xmlDoc=$xmlDoc+'<key path="'+$attr+'" name="'+$propName+'" value="'+$propValue+'" state="deleted"/>' } } write-output "===snapshot is inconsistent===" }
$xmlDoc=$xmlDoc+"</registrySnapshot>"
$doc=[xml]$xmlDoc
$Utf8NoBomEncoding = New-Object System.Text.UTF8Encoding($False) $w = New-Object System.Xml.XmlTextWriter($reportFile, $Utf8NoBomEncoding) $doc.Save($w) $w.Close() :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_REPORT_FILE#="&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#\snapshot\&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID#\compare_&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.xml"

row.post_process: : SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",,"REP") : PROCESS &hnd# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#) : IF &LINE# = "===snapshot is inconsistent===" : PSET &UC4RB_CONTENT_STATUS#="Inconsistent" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS
